name: Totem (itch) (tinyDinoGames)
description:
Introducing the cutest way to sacrifice someone via volcano, Totem! 

Totem is a strategy based resource management game where you play as a God struggling to maintain your following. Add travelers to your following, fight invaders, or have your subjects make offerings to you. This is your world and you know how best to run it!

Totem was built in 3 days for the Score Space Jam #6

tinyDino Games
